llm_text:
Why:
The model flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach (value=1; SHAP +2.92228, direction=increase), combined with large transaction amounts amount_received (13305.9; SHAP +0.901933, increase) and amount_paid (13305.9; SHAP +0.701585, increase). The dayofweek (6, i.e., Sunday; SHAP +0.700257, increase) further raised the score. These four features contributed the largest positive SHAP effects and collectively pushed the alert above threshold.

Conclusion:
This alert appears to result mainly from an ACH transaction (payment_format_ach) involving identical sizable pay/receive amounts (amount_received and amount_paid = 13305.9) occurring on dayofweek=6. Note that other features (e.g., to_bank and payment_currency_us_dollar) had modest negative SHAP contributions and partially offset the increase. If pursuing review, prioritize verifying ACH routing and the business rationale for the amount and timing.
